long_description: Nikwax Down wash safely cleans your down-filled gear to help restore the loft and insulation. Non-detergent cleaner gently lifts out dirt to restore loft as it revitalizes the original water repellency and maintains breathability. Great for use on goose down clothing and sleeping bags. Water-based formula is biodegradable and nonflammable; does not contain fluorocarbons.
short_description: Nikwax Down wash safely cleans your down-filled gear to help restore the loft and insulation.
